mapper.update:
update machine_info
machine_type = #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_function = #{machineFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update machine_info set machine_type = #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_function = #{machineFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_param = #{machineParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_attribute = #{machineAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_duration = #{usedDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, machine_brand = #{machineBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_status = #{machineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_work_time_once = #{machineWorkTimeOnce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, machine_provice_id = #{machineProviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_provice = #{machineProvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_city_id = #{machineCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_city = #{machineCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
